Package com.alibaba.graphscope.utils

Interface MessageStore<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type
    All Superinterfaces:
    PrimitiveArray<T>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageStore, DoubleMessageStore, IntMessageStore, LongMessageStore, ObjectMessageStore
    public interface MessageStore<T>
extends PrimitiveArray<T>
    Message store with bitset indicating validity.
